welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Long Eaton, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy our hidden gems and experience the true essence of our beloved city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Nottingham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
